mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (cus_id, cus_pw, cus_name, cus_nickname, cus_birthdaty, cus_profile, cus_phonenum ) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{profile}, #{phonenum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM authority WHERE cus_id = #{param1} AND cus_auth = #{param2}
mapper.select:
SELECT cus_uid uid, cus_id id, cus_pw pw, cus_name name, cus_nickname nickname, cus_birthdaty birthday, cus_profile profile, cus_phonenum phonenum, cus_enabled enabled,
FROM customer WHERE cus_id = #{id}
